attributes.action: Save the country further embarrassment by persuading the Olympic committee to rethink the logo announced today.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Olympic Games logo has cost nearly half a million pounds and has resulted in a spectacularly negative reaction from the general public who have footed the bill.

A design that incorporates what appears to be the Nazi Waffen SS lightening should not be seen as the symbol of the British Olympics.

Far better that it is changed now, before a number of countries officially object to the Nazi-like symbolism.

Lord Coe has obviously lost his grip and should be removed from the Olympic Committee as soon as possible and replaced with someone who has some common sense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
